Introduction
This topic contains information about other coding issues, including
denying
individual unemployability (IU)
, and
special monthly pension (SMP)
coding competency
, and
removing active duty discontinuance coding
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C - Coded Conclusion
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C
